title: FS: T206 Cobb Red Portrait SOLD
author: piecesofthegame

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Cobb Red Portrait SOLD
posts.post_content:
Offering this Cobb with excellent eye-appeal. It is trimmed and would only get an Authentic grade if submitted for grading but a nice looking card for the right collector. Feel free to PM with any questions. 

Price is SOLD paypal gift (firm)- I believe if you pay using your bank account paypal gift is free for both buyer and seller now.
